alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gove County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Gove, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Gove County, including the following locations... The Monument Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
